meanings.definition: The main course of a meal.
meanings.sent1: For dinner, we had delicious entrees like steak and pasta.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's menu offers a variety of entrees to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The entrees were so tasty that we couldn't stop eating!
meanings.sent4: The entrees were like stars shining brightly on the dinner table.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the entrees filled the room, making everyone's mouths water.

meanings.definition: A dish served before the main course of a meal.
meanings.sent1: The soup served as an entree was a delightful start to the meal.
meanings.sent2: The waiter brought out the entree of shrimp cocktail for us to enjoy.
meanings.sent3: The tiny entrees looked like appetizing miniatures on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The entree of salad was a refreshing oasis before the main course.
meanings.sent5: The entree of bruschetta was a burst of flavor in every bite.
